content:
Well-thought-through product announcements will help increase feature awareness and engage users with new functionality. Just like sharing your public roadmap, it’s also a great way to let potential customers see that you’re constantly improving.
Further reading hello
summary: You can use blog posts for announcing product updates and features.
title: Postone

content: We need your contribution simply send your react component
summary: We need your contribution simply send your react component
title: Our Contributions

content:
CollectionUI UI Components for React and Vite Projects
CollectionUI is a library of pre-built UI components designed for React and Vite projects. It provides a wide range of components that are easy to integrate and customize, helping you build beautiful, functional UIs with minimal effort.
Features TailwindCSS Styling: All components are styled with TailwindCSS. JavaScript Support: Works with JavaScript, no need for TypeScript. Theming: Customizable themes to fit your project’s design. Did you know?
You can install this npm package, then easily add components as needed for your project. Once your project is complete, simply uninstall the package to keep your setup clean and efficient.
summary:
CollectionUI

UI Components for React and Vite Projects

CollectionUI is a library of pre-built UI components designed for React and Vite projects. It provides a wide range of components that are easy to integrate and customize, helping you build beautiful, functional UIs with minimal effort.
title: Overview

content:
Note
Since these are essential for any project, I assume you’ve already installed React or Vite, along with TailwindCSS and React Router DOM. If not, make sure to set them up before proceeding.
npmpnpmYarnInstall package...npm install webcollectionuiInstall package...pnpm install webcollectionuiInstall package...yarn install webcollectionuiAfter successfully installing the webcollectionui package, you are now ready to install components from this package. Simply run the command in your terminal to get started.
npmpnpmYarnExecute commands for installing components...npx add-componentsExecute commands for installing components...pnpm add-componentsExecute commands for installing components...yarn add-componentsHere’s a list of available components in the webcollectionui package. Simply enter the names of the components you want to install and enhance your project effortlessly!
Available components to add: BasicFeature, BasicHome, BasicNavbar …
prompt: Enter the components you want to add (comma-separated, case-sensitive):: Enter components name
Danger
You may encounter issues if the src folder is not present in your project, as all code is initially placed inside /src/components. Once installed, you can move the component files to any folder within your project as needed.
Clear navigation User-configurable color theme i18n support
summary: Note
title: Installation

content: BasicHome.jsx1import React from "react"; 2 3const BasicHome = () => { 4 return ( 5 <> 6 <section> 7 <div className="max-w-screen-xl mx-auto px-4 py-28 gap-12 text-gray-600 md:px-8"> 8 <div className="space-y-5 max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center"> 9 <h1 className="text-sm text-indigo-600 font-medium"> 10 Build products for everyone 11 </h1> 12 <h2 className="text-4xl text-gray-800 font-extrabold mx-auto md:text-5xl"> 13 Design your projects faster with{" "} 14 <span className="text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-[#4F46E5] to-[#E114E5]"> 15 the collection of UI components 16 </span> 17 </h2> 18 <p className="max-w-2xl mx-auto"> 19 Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus voluptatem accusantium 20 doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae. 21 </p> 22 <div className="items-center justify-center gap-x-3 space-y-3 sm:flex sm:space-y-0"> 23 <a 24 href="#" 25 className="block py-2 px-4 text-white font-medium bg-indigo-600 duration-150 hover:bg-indigo-500 active:bg-indigo-700 rounded-lg shadow-lg hover:shadow-none" 26 > 27 Browse courses 28 </a> 29 <a 30 href="#" 31 className="block py-2 px-4 text-gray-700 hover:text-gray-500 font-medium duration-150 active:bg-gray-100 border rounded-lg" 32 > 33 Get access 34 </a> 35 </div> 36 </div> 37 </div> 38 </section> 39 </> 40 ); 41}; 42 43export default BasicHome;
title: Basic Home

content: BasicNavbar.jsx1import React, { useState } from "react"; 2import { CiHome, CiCircleList, CiUser, CiHeadphones } from "react-icons/ci"; 3 4const BasicNavbar = () => { 5 const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false); 6 7 const navigation_menu = [ 8 { 9 menu_title: "Home", 10 url_path: "/", 11 menu_icon: <CiHome />, 12 }, 13 { 14 menu_title: "Project", 15 url_path: "/project", 16 menu_icon: <CiCircleList />, 17 }, 18 { 19 menu_title: "About", 20 url_path: "/about", 21 menu_icon: <CiUser />, 22 }, 23 { 24 menu_title: "Contact", 25 url_path: "/contact", 26 menu_icon: <CiHeadphones />, 27 }, 28 ]; 29 30 return ( 31 <> 32 <nav className="flex justify-between px-6 py-3 box-border w-full bg-gradient-to-r from-white/10 via-white/20 to-white/10 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/20 shadow-lg text-xl"> 33 <div>Logo</div> 34 35 <div className="md:hidden flex items-center"> 36 <button 37 className="text-3xl focus:outline-none" 38 onClick={() => setIsDrawerOpen(true)} 39 > 40 &#9776; 41 </button> 42 </div> 43 44 <div className="hidden md:flex items-center"> 45 <ul className="flex space-x-6"> 46 {navigation_menu.map((menu_item, index_value) => { 47 return ( 48 <li key={index_value}> 49 <a href={menu_item.url_path} className="flex items-center"> 50 <span className="px-1">{menu_item.menu_icon}</span> 51 {menu_item.menu_title} 52 </a> 53 </li> 54 ); 55 })} 56 </ul> 57 </div> 58 59 <div className="hidden md:block">Login</div> 60 </nav> 61 62 {isDrawerOpen && ( 63 <div 64 className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-sm z-40" 65 onClick={() => setIsDrawerOpen(false)} 66 ></div> 67 )} 68 69 <div 70 className={`fixed top-0 left-0 h-full w-4/5 bg-gray-900 text-white transform ${ 71 isDrawerOpen ? "translate-x-0" : "-translate-x-full" 72 } transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out z-50`} 73 > 74 <ul className="mt-10 space-y-6"> 75 {navigation_menu.map((menu_item, index_value) => { 76 return ( 77 <li key={index_value} className="px-6"> 78 <a 79 href={menu_item.url_path} 80 className="flex items-center space-x-2" 81 > 82 <span>{menu_item.menu_icon}</span> 83 {menu_item.menu_title} 84 </a> 85 </li> 86 ); 87 })} 88 </ul> 89 </div> 90 </> 91 ); 92}; 93 94export default BasicNavbar;
title: Basic Navbar

content: Cards.jsx1import React from 'react'; 2import { FaShoppingCart, FaHeart, FaStar } from 'react-icons/fa'; 3 4const products = [ 5 { 6 id: 1, 7 image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300", 8 name: "Sample Product 1", 9 description: "This is the description of product 1 that is dynamically truncated.", 10 price: 100.0, 11 discount: 20, 12 category: "Electronics", 13 subcategory: "Smartphones", 14 rating: 4.5, 15 reviews: 120, 16 }, 17 { 18 id: 2, 19 image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300", 20 name: "Sample Product 2", 21 description: "This is the description of product 2, which is also dynamically truncated.", 22 price: 150.0, 23 discount: 15, 24 category: "Home Appliances", 25 subcategory: "Kitchen", 26 rating: 4.0, 27 reviews: 85, 28 }, 29 { 30 id: 3, 31 image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300", 32 name: "Sample Product 3", 33 description: "This description for product 3 showcases truncation in a professional UI.", 34 price: 200.0, 35 discount: 10, 36 category: "Fashion", 37 subcategory: "Clothing", 38 rating: 3.8, 39 reviews: 50, 40 }, 41 { 42 id: 4, 43 image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300", 44 name: "Sample Product 4", 45 description: "This is product 4's description for showcasing professional spacing.", 46 price: 250.0, 47 discount: 25, 48 category: "Sports", 49 subcategory: "Fitness", 50 rating: 4.7, 51 reviews: 200, 52 }, 53 { 54 id: 5, 55 image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300", 56 name: "Sample Product 5", 57 description: "Here is the description for product 5, professionally styled.", 58 price: 300.0, 59 discount: 30, 60 category: "Books", 61 subcategory: "Fiction", 62 rating: 4.9, 63 reviews: 150, 64 }, 65]; 66 67const Cards = () => { 68 return ( 69 <div className="min-h-screen p-6 font-sans"> 70 <h1 className="text-3xl font-extrabold text-center mb-8 tracking-wide"> 71 Explore Our Products 72 </h1> 73 <div className="grid gap-8 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 max-w-7xl mx-auto"> 74 {products.map((product) => { 75 const discountedPrice = product.price - (product.price * product.discount) / 100; 76 77 return ( 78 <div 79 key={product.id} 80 className="bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg shadow-lg hover:shadow-2xl transition-shadow duration-300 transform hover:scale-105" 81 > 82 <div className="relative"> 83 <img 84 className="w-full h-56 object-cover rounded-t-lg transition-all duration-500 transform hover:scale-110" 85 src={product.image} 86 alt={product.name} 87 /> 88 89 <div className="absolute bottom-3 right-3 flex flex-col space-y-3"> 90 <button 91 className="text-gray-500 hover:text-red-500 transition duration-300 transform hover:scale-110" 92 title="Add to Wishlist" 93 > 94 <FaHeart size={20} /> 95 </button> 96 <button 97 className="text-gray-500 hover:text-blue-500 transition duration-300 transform hover:scale-110" 98 title="Add to Cart" 99 > 100 <FaShoppingCart size={20} /> 101 </button> 102 </div> 103 </div> 104 105 <div className="p-5"> 106 <div className="flex space-x-2 mb-3"> 107 <span className="bg-blue-500 text-white text-xs font-medium px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-md"> 108 {product.category} 109 </span> 110 <span className="bg-gray-500 text-white text-xs font-medium px-3 py-1 rounded-full shadow-md"> 111 {product.subcategory} 112 </span> 113 </div> 114 115 <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 truncate mb-2 hover:text-blue-500"> 116 {product.name} 117 </h2> 118 <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-2 truncate">{product.description}</p> 119 120 <div className="flex items-center mt-3"> 121 <FaStar className="text-yellow-400" /> 122 <span className="text-sm text-gray-600 ml-2"> 123 {product.rating.toFixed(1)} 124 <span className="ml-1 text-gray-500">({product.reviews} reviews)</span> 125 </span> 126 </div> 127 128 <div className="mt-4 flex justify-between items-center"> 129 <div className="flex items-center space-x-3"> 130 <p className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900"> 131 ${discountedPrice.toFixed(2)} 132 </p> 133 <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 line-through"> 134 ${product.price.toFixed(2)} 135 </p> 136 <p className="text-sm text-green-500 font-medium"> 137 Save {product.discount}% 138 </p> 139 </div> 140 </div> 141 </div> 142 </div> 143 ); 144 })} 145 </div> 146 </div> 147 ); 148}; 149 150export default Cards;
title: Cards

content: Carousel.jsx1import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; 2 3const Carousel = () => { 4 const images = [ 5 "https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+1", 6 "https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+2", 7 "https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+3", 8 "https://via.placeholder.com/800x400?text=Slide+4", 9 ]; 10 11 const [isTransitioning, setIsTransitioning] = useState(false); 12 const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); 13 const carouselRef = useRef(null); 14 15 useEffect(() => { 16 const interval = setInterval(() => { 17 moveToNext(); 18 }, 3000); 19 20 return () => clearInterval(interval); 21 }, []); 22 23 const moveToNext = () => { 24 if (!carouselRef.current) return; 25 setIsTransitioning(true); 26 carouselRef.current.style.transition = "transform 0.7s ease-in-out"; 27 carouselRef.current.style.transform = `translateX(-100%)`; 28 29 setTimeout(() => { 30 const firstChild = carouselRef.current.children[0]; 31 carouselRef.current.appendChild(firstChild); 32 carouselRef.current.style.transition = "none"; 33 carouselRef.current.style.transform = "translateX(0)"; 34 setIsTransitioning(false); 35 setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % images.length); 36 }, 700); 37 }; 38 39 const moveToPrevious = () => { 40 if (!carouselRef.current) return; 41 const lastChild = 42 carouselRef.current.children[carouselRef.current.children.length - 1]; 43 carouselRef.current.prepend(lastChild); 44 carouselRef.current.style.transition = "none"; 45 carouselRef.current.style.transform = "translateX(-100%)"; 46 47 setTimeout(() => { 48 carouselRef.current.style.transition = "transform 0.7s ease-in-out"; 49 carouselRef.current.style.transform = "translateX(0)"; 50 setCurrentIndex( 51 (prevIndex) => (prevIndex - 1 + images.length) % images.length 52 ); 53 }, 50); 54 }; 55 56 const handleDotClick = (index) => { 57 if (!carouselRef.current || index === currentIndex) return; 58 59 const moveBy = index - currentIndex; 60 if (moveBy > 0) { 61 for (let i = 0; i < moveBy; i++) { 62 moveToNext(); 63 } 64 } else { 65 for (let i = 0; i < -moveBy; i++) { 66 moveToPrevious(); 67 } 68 } 69 }; 70 71 return ( 72 <div className="relative w-full max-w-full mx-auto overflow-hidden bg-gray-100 shadow-lg border-2 border-yellow-500"> 73 {/* Image Slider */} 74 <div 75 ref={carouselRef} 76 className="flex transition-transform duration-700" 77 style={{ 78 display: "flex", 79 }} 80 > 81 {images.map((image, idx) => ( 82 <div key={idx} className="w-full flex-shrink-0"> 83 <img 84 src={image} 85 alt={`Slide ${idx + 1}`} 86 className="w-full object-cover h-[30vh] sm:h-[50vh]" // 30vh for mobile, 40vh for larger screens 87 /> 88 </div> 89 ))} 90 </div> 91 92 {/* Dot Indicators */} 93 <div className="absolute bottom-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 flex space-x-3"> 94 {images.map((_, idx) => ( 95 <button 96 key={idx} 97 onClick={() => handleDotClick(idx)} 98 className={`w-4 h-4 rounded-full transition-colors duration-300 ${ 99 idx === currentIndex ? "bg-blue-500" : "bg-gray-300" 100 }`} 101 ></button> 102 ))} 103 </div> 104 105 {/* Navigation Buttons */} 106 <button 107 onClick={moveToPrevious} 108 className="absolute left-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-700 hover:text-gray-900 p-2 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 group" 109 > 110 <svg 111 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 112 className="w-6 h-6 group-hover:scale-110 transform transition-transform" 113 fill="none" 114 viewBox="0 0 24 24" 115 stroke="currentColor" 116 strokeWidth="2" 117 > 118 <path 119 strokeLinecap="round" 120 strokeLinejoin="round" 121 d="M15 19l-7-7 7-7" 122 /> 123 </svg> 124 </button> 125 <button 126 onClick={moveToNext} 127 className="absolute right-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-700 hover:text-gray-900 p-2 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 group" 128 > 129 <svg 130 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 131 className="w-6 h-6 group-hover:scale-110 transform transition-transform" 132 fill="none" 133 viewBox="0 0 24 24" 134 stroke="currentColor" 135 strokeWidth="2" 136 > 137 <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" d="M9 5l7 7-7 7" /> 138 </svg> 139 </button> 140 </div> 141 ); 142}; 143 144export default Carousel;
title: Carousel

content: Pricing.jsx1import React from "react"; 2 3const Pricing = () => { 4 const plans = [ 5 { 6 name: "Enterprise", 7 desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", 8 price: 32, 9 isMostPop: true, 10 features: [ 11 "Curabitur faucibus", 12 "massa ut pretium maximus", 13 "Sed posuere nisi", 14 "Pellentesque eu nibh et neque", 15 "Suspendisse a leo", 16 "Praesent quis venenatis ipsum", 17 "Duis non diam vel tortor", 18 ], 19 }, 20 { 21 name: "Startup", 22 desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.", 23 price: 12, 24 isMostPop: false, 25 features: [ 26 "Curabitur faucibus", 27 "massa ut pretium maximus", 28 "Sed posuere nisi", 29 "Pellentesque eu nibh et neque", 30 "Suspendisse a leo", 31 "Praesent quis venenatis ipsum", 32 "Duis non diam vel tortor", 33 ], 34 }, 35 ]; 36 37 return ( 38 <section className="relative py-14 bg-gray-900"> 39 <div 40 className="absolute inset-0 blur-[118px] max-w-lg h-[800px] mx-auto sm:max-w-3xl sm:h-[400px]" 41 style={{ 42 background: 43 "linear-gradient(106.89deg, rgba(192, 132, 252, 0.11) 15.73%, rgba(14, 165, 233, 0.41) 15.74%, rgba(232, 121, 249, 0.26) 56.49%, rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.4) 115.91%)", 44 }} 45 ></div> 46 <div className="relative max-w-screen-xl mx-auto text-gray-300 sm:px-4 md:px-8"> 47 <div className="max-w-xl mx-auto space-y-3 px-4 sm:text-center sm:px-0"> 48 <h3 className="text-cyan-400 font-semibold">Pricing</h3> 49 <p className="text-white text-3xl font-semibold sm:text-4xl"> 50 Pay as you grow 51 </p> 52 <div className="max-w-xl"> 53 <p> 54 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam 55 efficitur consequat nunc. 56 </p> 57 </div> 58 </div> 59 <div className="mt-16 justify-center sm:flex"> 60 {plans.map((item, idx) => ( 61 <div 62 key={idx} 63 className={`relative flex-1 flex items-stretch flex-col mt-6 border-2 sm:mt-0 sm:rounded-xl sm:max-w-md ${ 64 item.isMostPop 65 ? "bg-gray-900 border-cyan-400 border-x-0 sm:border-x-2" 66 : "border-transparent" 67 }`} 68 > 69 <div className="p-4 py-8 space-y-4 border-b border-gray-700 md:p-8"> 70 <span className="text-gray-200 font-medium">{item.name}</span> 71 <div className="text-cyan-400 text-3xl font-semibold"> 72 ${item.price} <span className="text-xl font-normal">/mo</span> 73 </div> 74 <p className="text-gray-400">{item.desc}</p> 75 <button className="px-3 py-3 rounded-lg w-full font-semibold text-sm duration-150 text-white bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-600 active:bg-cyan-700"> 76 Get Started 77 </button> 78 </div> 79 <ul className="p-4 py-8 space-y-3 md:p-8"> 80 {item.features.map((featureItem, idx) => ( 81 <li key={idx} className="flex items-center gap-5"> 82 <svg 83 xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 84 className={`h-5 w-5 ${ 85 item.isMostPop ? "text-cyan-600" : "" 86 }`} 87 viewBox="0 0 20 20" 88 fill="currentColor" 89 > 90 <path 91 fill-rule="evenodd" 92 d="M16.707 5.293a1 1 0 010 1.414l-8 8a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-4-4a1 1 0 011.414-1.414L8 12.586l7.293-7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0z" 93 clip-rule="evenodd" 94 ></path> 95 </svg> 96 {featureItem} 97 </li> 98 ))} 99 </ul> 100 </div> 101 ))} 102 </div> 103 </div> 104 </section> 105 ); 106}; 107 108export default Pricing;
title: Pricing

Morbi 31 venenatis sollicitudin quam ut tincidunt. 32 </p> 33 </div> 34 <div className="mt-12"> 35 <ul className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-y-10 sm:flex-row sm:flex-wrap lg:divide-x"> 36 {stats.map((item, idx) => ( 37 <li key={idx} className="text-center px-12 md:px-16"> 38 <h4 className="text-4xl text-indigo-600 font-semibold"> 39 {item.data} 40 </h4> 41 <p className="mt-3 font-medium">{item.title}</p> 42 </li> 43 ))} 44 </ul> 45 </div> 46 </div> 47 </section> 48 ); 49}; 50 51export default Stats;

content:
Privacy Policy Last updated: April 21, 2025
Thank you for using webcollectionui. We value your privacy and want to be transparent about what data we do or do not collect.
1. Data Collection webcollectionui is a frontend component library distributed via npm. It does not:
Collect any personal information Track user activity Send any data to external servers The package runs entirely on the client side and is designed to work within your application’s environment without transmitting data externally.
2. Usage Analytics We do not collect or track analytics data through this package. Any analytics implemented in your application that uses webcollectionui are your responsibility and are not related to this package.
3. Third-party Services webcollectionui does not include any built-in third-party tracking scripts or SDKs. However, if you integrate third-party services into your application, their respective privacy policies will apply.
4. Updates to this Policy We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices. Any changes will be updated in this file and dated accordingly.
5. Contact If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, feel free to reach out via the issue tracker on our GitHub repository or by email at [webcollectionui@gmail.com].
By using webcollectionui, you agree to this privacy policy.
summary:
Privacy Policy
